data.text:
Heat Wave

Craig and Mitch try to rescue two boys trapped in a storm drain where the water level rises with the tide.

Toy Story

The Toyman conspires to kidnap children, hoping to get them away from what he believes are evil adults.

The Starships Are Coming

A fanatic (Andrew Duggan) plans to start a nuclear war by using his own television station to simulate attacks by alien spaceships.
